meanings.definition: Represented in a painting or picture.
meanings.sent1: The depainted landscape looked so real.
meanings.sent2: The depainted flowers added beauty to the room.
meanings.sent3: The depainted cat seemed to come alive on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her depainted smile captured the essence of joy.
meanings.sent5: The depainted sunset was a masterpiece of colors.

meanings.sent1: The depainted door had a fresh, glossy look.
meanings.sent2: The depainted car sparkled under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The depainted walls made the room feel brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her depainted nails matched her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The depainted boat was ready for a day on the water.
